title: Diary of a Wimpy Kid
description: Navigate the treacherous waters of middle school with Greg Heffley. Make choices that could change his social status and friendships forever.

characters.name: Greg Heffley
characters.description: An ambitious middle schooler trying to become popular
characters.background: Starting middle school and obsessed with becoming popular

characters.name: Rowley Jefferson
characters.description: Greg's innocent and loyal best friend
characters.background: Greg's childhood friend who just wants to have fun

characters.name: Rodrick Heffley
characters.description: Greg's older brother and constant tormentor
characters.personality: mischievous, lazy, musical, protective when needed
characters.background: High school student in a band who loves pranking Greg
